sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import './components/App.css'
import './assets/css/bootstrap.min.css'
import './assets/css/font-awesome.css'
import NavBar from './NavBar.js'
import Home from './components/Home.js'
import Fiscal from './components/Fiscal.js'


import sayblue_header from './assets/mockups/headers/Sayblue.png'
import fiscal_header from './assets/mockups/headers/Fiscal.png'
import enbridge_header from './assets/mockups/headers/Enbridge.png'
import auto_header from './assets/mockups/headers/AutoGroceries.png'
import engsoc_header from './assets/mockups/headers/EngSoc.png'
import safe_header from './assets/mockups/headers/Safe.png'
import covid_header from './assets/mockups/headers/covid.png'

import fiscal_colour from './assets/colours/fiscal.svg'
import auto_colour from './assets/colours/auto.svg'
import enbridge_colour from './assets/colours/enbridge.svg'
import space_colour from './assets/colours/space.svg'
import covid_colour from './assets/colours/covid.svg'
import safe_colour from './assets/colours/safe.svg'
import sayblue_colour from './assets/colours/sayblue.svg'

import Project from './components/ProjectTemplate.js'

import fiscal_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import fiscal_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import fiscal_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import auto_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import auto_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import auto_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import sfast_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import sfast_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import sfast_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import pm_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import pm_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import pm_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import space_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import space_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import space_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import covid_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import covid_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import covid_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import safe_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import safe_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import safe_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import sayblue_one from './assets/mockups/fiscal/1.png'
import sayblue_two from './assets/mockups/fiscal/2.png'
import sayblue_three from './assets/mockups/fiscal/3.png'

import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";
import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";
import {
  BrowserRouter as Router,
  Switch,
  Route,
  Link
} from "react-router-dom";

import LogRocket from 'logrocket';



export class App extends Component {
  constructor() {
    super()
    this.state = { loading: true };
    LogRocket.init('0xjuad/clearweb-main-site');
  }

  componentDidMount() {
    // this simulates an async action, after which the component will render the content
    this.setState({ loading: false });
  }

  render() {

    return (
      <Router>
        <NavBar />
        <Switch>
          <Route path="/fiscal">
          <Project header_image={fiscal_header} title="Fiscal Fresh" desc="Browse and search millions of healthy recipes, create a meal plan then continue to checkout. Required groceries will be auto added to Instacart checkout.
                  This web application aims to cut out the middle man of meal delivery services and brings the savings back to the consumer." 
                  colour="#6BD34C" usecase="Individuals having difficulty finding time to cook quick, healthy, 
                  and reasonably priced meals with a sustainable supply chain. Making meals can be tough!" 
                  colour_scheme={fiscal_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/sayblue">
            <Project header_image={sayblue_header} title="Say Blue Music" desc="Sayblue Music is an EDM DJ in the Greater Toronto Area." 
            colour="#1C2C44" usecase="They asked for a simple yet compelling album cover to portray their avatar next to the artist Elephant Plans for their remix." 
            colour_scheme={sayblue_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/space">
          <Project header_image={engsoc_header} title="Space Hour Logger" desc="Sci Formal is a celebration for all of Queen's Engineering held annually. This mern web application keeps track of 400+ simultaneous volunteers putting together the space themed formal. Features User, Manager, and Admin sign-in with different access levels. 
          Managers can start the hour logging process while admins are able to add or remove hours from specific students. 
          Users can sign in and view how many hours they have left." 
          colour="#000000" usecase="Over 400+ users are required to complete volunteer hours before attending their formal. " 
          colour_scheme={space_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          
          <Route path="/auto">
          <Project header_image={sayblue_header} title="Auto Groceries Mobile" desc="Native iOS and Android deployment of Fiscal Fresh.
          Browse and search millions of healthy recipes, create a meal plan then continue to checkout. Required groceries will be auto added to Instacart checkout.
          " colour="#6BD34C" usecase="Individuals having difficulty finding time to cook quick, healthy, 
          and reasonably priced meals with a sustainable supply chain. Making meals can be tough!" 
          colour_scheme={auto_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/safe">
          <Project header_image={safe_header} title="SAFE Dentistry" desc="Start-up aiming to reduce the risk of infection within dental clinics by delivering a 
          customized infection prevention and control audit program for dental offices and staff." 
          colour="#25bded" usecase="Dental clinics can request audits and upon completion they will be granted safe and clean practice status." 
          colour_scheme={safe_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/enbridgesfast">
          <Project header_image={enbridge_header} title="Enbridge Station Field Assessment Survey Tool" desc="Internal Enbridge Application - Station Field Assesment Survey Tool. 
          An application to collect information, photos and video about field asset integrity, automatically reporting findings to management." colour="#282828" usecase="Application is used 100+ field staff to retrieve important details of in field assets through mobile use. 
          Information retrieved can be viewed in desktop format for management. Increased usage by 10x compared to prior application" 
          colour_scheme={enbridge_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/enbridgepm">
          <Project header_image={enbridge_header} title="Enbridge Project Mangagement Tool" desc="Internal Enbridge Application - Engineering Dept. Project Management Tool to allow PMs to 
          submit status updates and display them on a compiled dashboard." 
          colour="#ffb612" usecase="Project Managers submitting status updates to be viewed in a compiled manner by upper management" colour_scheme={enbridge_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/covid">
          <Project header_image={covid_header} title="Covid Dashboard" desc="Dashboard redesign for tracking COVID-19, 
          displaying all necessary information condensely sorted by selecting a specific country or region." colour="#cc1e1e" 
          usecase="Displaying data is a refined manner and allowing user to choose what they want to see at the moment." 
          colour_scheme={covid_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/blc">
          <Project header_image={covid_header} title="Biotech Leadership Consulting" desc="Biotech Leadership Consulting, LLC provides management consulting on bringing diverse experts together into a high performing team." colour="#cc1e1e" 
          usecase="You identified a target that will be the next big thing. You hired the best experts, and gave them the resources and incentives to meet your milestone. So why do they seem to be lost in the woods?" 
          colour_scheme={covid_colour} port1={one} port2={two} port3={three} />
          </Route>
          <Route path="/">
            <Home />
          </Route>
        </Switch>
      </Router>
    );
  }
}



export default App;
